steps.title: Make sure the Cheats option is enabled.
steps.content: Make sure the Cheats option is enabled.

steps.title: In the game, press t to open chat.
steps.content: In the game, press t to open chat.

steps.title: Various commands can be used to change things in the game.
steps.content: Various commands can be used to change things in the game. For example, typing "/time set 0" will change the time of day to sunrise.

steps.title: Open an inventory editor, like INVedit.
steps.content: Open an inventory editor, like INVedit.

steps.title: Set the damage to a very low negative number (e.g.
steps.content: Set the damage to a very low negative number (e.g. -40000).

steps.title: Open the world you saved it to.
steps.content: Open the world you saved it to.

steps.title: You will be invincible to mobs as long as you wear this armor.
steps.content: You will be invincible to mobs as long as you wear this armor. Note: Fall damage, drowning, or fire can still hurt you.

steps.title: Find tutorials and download Cheat Engine.
steps.content: Find tutorials and download Cheat Engine .

steps.title: Install mods that allow you to manipulate the game like INVedit or MCedit.
steps.content: Install mods that allow you to manipulate the game like INVedit or MCedit . You can download Optifine as a mod. It improves the video settings of the game. [1] X Research source It provides access to various texture packs with special features that change the look of the world. [2] X Research source It offers new actions and cosmetic features. They give Minecraft a cleaner look. [3] X Research source
